name: A Rushed Hack Job
description:
What happens when you're given 3 months to make a Jam game but wind up only working on your game on the last 3 days?

You get A Rushed Hack Job, which is both the name of this game and an accurate description of its production process.

Rush through the forest hacking apart targets as they appear, but be careful not to let too many targets escape or its game over.

A to Jump

A + A to double Jump

B to swing your sword

Left/Right to advance or retreat

Music by Nikku4211
